title: No Fee N. Cambridge 2br 9/1
posting_body: Sunny 2 bedroom unit on the 3rd floor of a three-family building, ~900 sqft , Open living/dining rooms layout with lots of sunlight, large EIK, no dishwasher, hardwood floors, bedrooms with walk-in closets, gas heat, washer hookup in unit, one assigned off-street parking space included, plenty of parking on street, less than 5 mins walk to MBTA redline T station, Russell Field/Minuteman bike path, Alewife shopping mall (Whole Foods, Trade Joe, CVS, Dunkin Donuts, restaurants), within the vicinity of plenty of walking/running/biking trails.
close to Harvard, Davis Square, RT16 and RT 2, $2100/month, Utilities Not Included, No Pets, Available: 09/01/2022.
Ideal for 2 graduates students/a young professional couple.
If interested, please us about yourself and a brief description of your living situation to arrange a showing.
